subject: Scholarships and Fellowships
College Athletics
Amateur Athletics
lead_paragraph: The National Association of Intercollegiate Athletics also provided scholarship data to The New York Times. The athletes received an average of $6,784 in 19 sports during the 2003-4 academic year.
